channel.title: istio on DI Herbert Mühlburger
channel.description: Recent content in istio on DI Herbert Mühlburger

item.title: Istio
item.description: Istio has gained lots of traction in the Kubernetes space. Here is a compiled list of interesting talks on Istio. Kudos to Lachlan Evenson for creating this content: Setting Sail with Istio Istio - up and running by Lachlan Evenson Istio - adding services to the mesh by Lachlan Evenson Istio - Working with Ingress Istio - Working with Egress Istio - Request Routing Istio - Fault Injection Testing I hope you find something useful in these resources.
